statements: DELETE FROM carbon_emissions WHERE emission_level > 50.00 AND vehicle_type = 'SUV';
DELETE FROM shipping WHERE sender_name = 'John Smith';
DELETE FROM transportation WHERE vehicle_id = 100 AND vehicle_type = 'Car';
DELETE FROM shipping WHERE sender_name = 'John Doe' AND receiver_name = 'Jane Smith';
DELETE FROM shipping_data WHERE date < '2022-01-01' AND carbon_emissions_kg <= 500;
DELETE FROM shipping WHERE company_name = 'ABC Shipping';
DELETE FROM transportation WHERE id = 101 AND emissions > 10.0;
DELETE FROM shipping WHERE distance > 1000 AND weight > 500;
